title: Is the ‘George Floyd Challenge’ Real?
subtitle: A disturbing "challenge" featuring mostly young white men kneeling on each other's necks appears to mimic the death of George Floyd.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Using hashtags such as #GeorgeFloydChallenge, white people are taking part in a widespread effort in which they post photos of themselves kneeling on each other's necks to mimic or mock the death of George Floyd, a black man who died after a police officer kneeled on his neck.
